entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as 'Harry' and 'Harry Potter'. He is following Dumbledore on a journey.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A person who is leading Harry on a journey. Mentioned as 'Dumbledore' and 'he'.

entities.name: ogden
entities.description: A person who has broken into a trot due to the steep downward slope. Mentioned as 'Ogden' and 'his frock-coat'.

entities.name: little hangleton
entities.description: A village that Harry thinks is their final destination. Mentioned as 'Little Hangleton'.

entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: A person who was found on a previous night, mentioned in the context of why they had to approach Little Hangleton from a distance.

relationships.description: Harry is following Dumbledore on their journey. Mentioned as 'he hurried to keep up' and 'Dumbledore lengthened his stride'.

Harry is following Ogden on their journey. Mentioned as 'he soon discovered that he was mistaken in thinking that they were going to the village' and 'Dumbledore and Harry came to a halt behind Ogden'.
Ogden's frock-coat is passing through a gap in the hedge. Mentioned as 'the very edge of Ogdenâ€™s frock-coat vanishing through a gap in the hedge'.
